meanings.definition: To set or thrust in motion.
meanings.sent1: She launches the ball into the air.
meanings.sent3: The cat launches itself off the couch in pursuit of a toy.
meanings.sent4: His speech launches a wave of excitement among the audience.
meanings.sent5: The car launches forward with a sudden burst of speed.

meanings.definition: To start or introduce something new.
meanings.sent1: He launches a new project at work.
meanings.sent2: The company launches a new product line.
meanings.sent3: The idea launches a series of brainstorming sessions.
meanings.sent4: Her song launches a fresh wave of creativity in the music industry.
meanings.sent5: The book launch event introduces the author to the readers.

meanings.definition: To throw or propel with force.
meanings.sent1: He launches the ball across the field.
meanings.sent2: The catapult launches the stone towards the castle.
meanings.sent3: The chef launches the pizza dough high into the air.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind launches the kite into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The pitcher launches the baseball towards home plate.
